translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, map_sheet_id, orig_stand_id, ogc_fid}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

validation_rules: pc02_hasCountOfNotNull(v1sp1, v2sp1, v3sp1, v4sp1, v5sp1, v6sp1, v7sp1, v1pcm, v2pcm, v3pcm, v4pcm, v5pcm, v6pcm, v7pcm, shrln, 'translation', 'species_code_mapping', 'pc02_species_codes', 1, FALSE|-8886)
translation_rules: pc02_countOfNotNull(v1sp1, v2sp1, v3sp1, v4sp1, v5sp1, v6sp1, v7sp1, v1pcm, v2pcm, v3pcm, v4pcm, v5pcm, v6pcm, v7pcm, shrln, 'translation', 'species_code_mapping', 'pc02_species_codes', 15)
description: Calculate number of layers according to presence of forest strata and non-forested strata. Possible layers are the 7 forested attributes, the 7 nfl attributes, and an 8th nfl attribute representing lakes. Total num_of_layers should not exceed 8, but any combination of the 15 attributes is possible.
Converts source area from km2 to ha. Return OUT_OF_RANGE for any zero values.
